title: Bloomberg Markets: Why is the Market’s Biggest Tightwad Buying?
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Why is the Market’s Biggest Tightwad Buying?
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Bill Smead CEO Smead Capital Management Discussing attending the Berkshire Hathaway Annual Meeting this weekend and Warren Buffett's investment strategy.
